title: Temenos of Athena
description: Area on the north-east side of the Piana di Himera, delimited by walls and containing four religious buildings (temples A, B, C and D), probably dedicated to Athena. The foundations are still visible in the archaeological site of Himera.

properties.description: OpenStreetMap location of the ruins of the so called Temenos of Athena in the archaeological site of Himera, Sicily.
properties.title: OSM location of the Temenos of Athena
